title: PBE account
body: Hello fellow summoners, I am derudin and I am here to talk about my PBE account. The status on the PBE website says TEST!. but when I try to log in it says my account is inactive. i Haven't received an email about the PBE either. was there a glitch with my PBE status?

replies.body:
Your status may be cached from previously looking at it. [Clear your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or try viewing your status from another browser you don't frequently use.

Let me know if this helped.
I Cleared browser history and used a different browser and it still says that i can test. But when i try to log in it says its inactive (on the client)

I had exactly the same issue. I opened a second support ticket since the previous one didn't fix anything. Still waiting for more information.

From what I learned my PBE account was suspended because it was created before 25th october 2013. But the support provided a link to create a new PBE account ... Which didn't work at all because the link sent me directly to the PBE status page (which is still "TEST!").
In that case, your PBE account may be compromised, so I'd recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this.
Anyone want to let me use their PBE account i just want to try Evelynn reowrk. ill send you my email =)
